name: market for heating and sanitary equipment, mini CHP plant | heating and sanitary equipment, mini CHP plant | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/7935/documentation

This is a market activity. In the case of services or immobile infrastructures, markets are connecting suppliers and consumers at a global level. For specific connections at regional level, direct links between the local producing activities and the local consumers are preferred. Transport or losses are logically not relevant for this type of products.;This is the market for  'heating and sanitary equipment, mini CHP plant', in the Global geography.;This market contains no transport or losses, as they are irrelevant for the delivered product.;This is an immobile infrastructure, representing the construction of a heating and sanitary equipment that is used in a mini combined heat and power (CHP) plant. This module includes the additional piping required in the heating center, the gas line from the house connection, an expansion vessel, a circulating pump, valves, distribution, and condensate disposal. Its assumed life time for operation is 100,000 h. The process includes all materials necessary to construct it and energy and water consumption during manufacturing.

This activity starts with the built infrastructure ready to use.

This activity ends with the infrastructure made accessible to the users. Transport or losses are considered irrelevant for this product.
category: F:Construction/42:Civil engineering/422:Construction of utility projects/4220:Construction of utility projects
